songs.title: It’s a Sin to Go Away
songs.album: Nuggets II: Original Artyfacts from the British Empire and Beyond, 1964-1969
songs.lyrics:
Oh it's a sin to go away
Maybe I'll return I will

When I turn my head I saw the lights
That disappeared behind the trees
Then I saw the moon
It was the same
I started to cry hiding my face
Oh it's a sin to go away
Maybe I'll return I will



Then I took the bread
She cooked for me
She said my son come back to me
Take my picture and remember this
Those times have gone
Don't cry for me

Oh it's a sin to go away
Maybe I'll return I will
